summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to drainage services of Seattle Public Utilities (SPU); updating definitions in Section 21.33.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code; amending Section 21.33.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code to adjust drainage rates; and amending Section 21.76.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code to revise credits to low-income drainage customers.
note: Originally referred to Seattle Public Utilities and Neighborhoods Committee on 7/26/10
